ComicInfo.Summary: Personality Conflict: Bruce, Rick and Betty return to Rick's place in Reno but Bruce is having problems keeping his personalities under control. When Rick's new flame turns out to be Marlo Chandler (you know, Joe Fixit's girlfriend from Las Vegas), the stress is too much for Bruce and the green and grey Hulks begin to battle within his psyche. As his body goes through a series of stunning transformations, Bruce proves once and for all that Banner is the strongest one there is.
ComicInfo.Tags: The Mount,Atalanta,Betty Ross,Paris,Hulk,Agamemnon,Doc Samson,Pantheon,Rick Jones,Marlo Chandler-Jones,Nevada,Prometheus
ComicInfo.Title: Personality Conflict
